name: World of strange games (Beta version)
description:
I already published demo version in 2021 year.

Now beta version released.

Main target explore 15 maze caves and defeat main boss.

Second target to play minigames and complete it to get items to sell since spawned monsters don't give any money.

And it's not necessary to complete them all and you can play most games and get items over and over again.

Some screens are very difficult and very long.

Most simple way to write a map on paper for each difficult area.

Also there are hidden mini-games and party member.
